breathless.translation[0].definitions[0]: having difficulty breathing, especially because you are very tired, excited, or frightened
The long climb left Jan feeling breathless.
breathless.translation[0].definitions[1]: His first novel drew breathless superlatives from critics.
breathless.translation[0].definitions[2]: unpleasantly hot, with no fresh air or wind
the breathless heat of a midsummer night in Rome
